languages.text: "Что бы ни говорила префект, я считаю, что мое решение было правильным".
"The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
languages.original_text: "Что бы ни говорила префект, я считаю, что мое решение было правильным".

traits.locale_text: "The prefect can say what she wants — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
"The prefect can say what she wants — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
"The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
"The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
"The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."
"The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

languages.text: 「総監が何を言おうと構わない。{mf|俺|私}は自分の選択が正しかったと確信している」
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: 「総監が何を言おうと構わない。{mf|俺|私}は自分の選択が正しかったと確信している」

languages.text: "Die Präfektin kann sagen, was sie will – ich bin überzeugt, dass ich die richtige Entscheidung getroffen habe."
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: "Die Präfektin kann sagen, was sie will – ich bin überzeugt, dass ich die richtige Entscheidung getroffen habe."

languages.text: « La préfète peut bien dire ce qu'elle veut. J'ai la conviction d'avoir fait le bon choix. »
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: « La préfète peut bien dire ce qu'elle veut. J'ai la conviction d'avoir fait le bon choix. »

languages.text: «La prefecta dirá lo que quiera; no me cabe ninguna duda de que tomé la decisión correcta».
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: «La prefecta dirá lo que quiera; no me cabe ninguna duda de que tomé la decisión correcta».

languages.text: “随便那个行政官怎么说都好，我坚信我的选择是正确的。”
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: “随便那个行政官怎么说都好，我坚信我的选择是正确的。”

languages.text: "Prefekt istediğini söyleyebilir. Demek ki doğru karar vermişim."
languages.original_text: "The prefect can say what she likes — I am convinced that I made the right choice."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt istediğini söyleyebilir. Demek ki doğru karar vermişim."
